title: [3DS] Mario & Luigi RPG: Paper Mario Mix [JPN]
description:
I am not sure what ROM number this is, because at the time of uploading this torrent, it has not been released by a scene group yet, so it has not been assigned a number yet.. But when it does have a number, I will post it in the comments..

Japanese name: Mario & Luigi RPG: Paper Mario Mix

Translated jap name: Mario & Luigi RPG: Paper Mario Mix

English name: Mario & Luigi: Paper Jam
Alternate English name: Mario & Luigi: Paper Jam Bros.

Released for the 3DS in Japan on 2015-12-03.

This is the japanese version, and it is only in japanese language..

This is a single .3ds file inside of a .7z archive file..

You need a gateway card or maybe some type of CFW to get this to work.. And you need a 3DS with lower version sysnand firmware..

I have confirmed it to work at least with this set up:
new-3DS
sysnand: 9.2.0
emunand: 9.2.0
gateway launcher software version 3.4.1
